players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I investigated Alice and found she is the mafia. Bob was killed last night by the mafia. Alice knows I'm detective, so she will try to frame us. Let's all vote Alice out."
Charlie: remained silent.
You: "I didn't kill Bob. I'm not sure who did. We should investigate Diana."
You: remained silent.
Diana: "Alice is the mafia. Vote her. Charlie, your silence says nothing. We should arrest her now."
Charlie: "Diana, your investigation shows Alice is mafia. Alice lied about killing Bob, and mafia always kills. Let's vote Alice out."
